parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is a unique user registration id successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to calculate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, used to identify user permissions to call API.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if error occurred

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if error occurred

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate warning details if warning. Empty if no warning

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for your reference

notes: The documentation includes Common Parameters, Request Parameters, Response Parameters, Request Example, Response Example, Error Example, Error Codes, and API Permissions sections. Multiple URLs are provided for different regions (Global, Chinese Mainland, Brazil, etc.).
